notes: Multiword Expressions are sequence of words, separated by space delimiter (or any) which determines a unique meaning instead of words' individual meanings. A list comprising of 927 Multi-word Expressions have been identified for Assamese language. Example of the Assamese MWEs are “মাটিৰ মানুহ”, “ খটক খটক ” etc.
title: Assamese Multi Word Expressions
